text: Rafael Nadal was the defending champion and successfully defended his title, defeating Dominic Thiem in the final, 6–4, 6–1. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky loser=== ===Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ====Fifth Qualifier==== ====Sixth Qualifier==== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Barcelona Open Banco Sabadellandnbsp;- Singles 2017 Singles
